casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Randy Lee SELLARS. No. 547P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Hilda Burnett-Baker, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC. Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, for Randy Lee Sellars.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of May 2006 by Defendant to Dismiss With Prejudice Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 15A-1443(a)(b)(c) and N.C.G.S. 15A-954(a)(I)(4)(7):

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of December 2006."
